entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
